description:
Luffy unleashes the full force of his Gum Gum furry on Wapol, and Chopper is amazed by the rubberman`s fierce devotion to the pirate flag.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Contre Wapol et sa bande ! Le pouvoir du fruit du glouton !
Fight Wapol`s Crew! The Power of the Munch Munch Fruit!
VS Wapol Gundan! Bakubaku no Mi no Nouryoku!
VSワポル軍団! バクバクの実の能力!
Бой с армией Вапола! Силы плода Хрум-Хрум!
ปะทะกองทัพวาโปล พลังของผลงั่มงั่ม
